about.title: about me
about.description: I am a front-end developer and a digital artist with many years of experience. My passion for technology and design has led me to specialize in front-end development. I am constantly learning new technologies to enhance my skills and provide solutions to my clients. Thank you for taking the time to get to know me, and I am excited to see how I can contribute to your future projects.

contact.title: contact me!
contact.description: I am actively searching and available for new opportunities. You can get in touch with me, and I will respond as quickly as possible.
